attacks.name: Siberian Pipeline Explosion
attacks.impact: Massive explosion in the Trans-Siberian pipeline, causing significant economic damage to the Soviet Union.

attacks.name: Gazprom Trojan Attack
attacks.impact: Unauthorized access to Gazprom's control systems, potentially allowing manipulation of gas flow.

attacks.name: Worcester Airport ICS Hack
attacks.impact: Disabled phone service and airport control tower communications for 6 hours.

attacks.name: Maroochy Water Services Attack
attacks.impact: Release of 800,000 liters of raw sewage into local parks, rivers and a hotel property.

attacks.name: Davis-Besse Nuclear Plant Slammer Infection
attacks.impact: Safety monitoring system disabled for nearly 5 hours.

attacks.name: Stuxnet
attacks.impact: Destroyed approximately 1,000 IR-1 centrifuges, setting back Iran's uranium enrichment program.

attacks.name: Night Dragon
attacks.target: Global Oil, Energy, and Petrochemical Companies
attacks.impact: Theft of proprietary operations information, project financing data, and bidding information.

attacks.name: Shamoon / Saudi Aramco Attack
attacks.impact: Destroyed data on 30,000+ workstations, disrupted business operations for weeks.

attacks.name: German Steel Mill Attack
attacks.impact: Massive physical damage to a blast furnace that could not be properly shut down.

attacks.name: HAVEX/Dragonfly Campaign
attacks.target: Energy Sector Organizations in US and Europe
attacks.impact: Espionage, potential preparation for future attacks on industrial systems.

attacks.name: Ukraine Power Grid Attack
attacks.impact: Power outage affecting 230,000 customers for up to 6 hours in the middle of winter.

attacks.name: Industroyer / Crash Override
attacks.impact: Power outage in Kiev for approximately 1 hour.

attacks.name: Kemuri Water Company Attack
attacks.target: Unnamed US Water Utility (Kemuri Water Company - pseudonym)
attacks.impact: Manipulation of chemical levels in water treatment (detected before harm occurred).

attacks.name: TRITON / TRISIS
attacks.impact: Unplanned shutdown of industrial processes; could have led to catastrophic safety failures.

attacks.name: NotPetya Global Attack
attacks.target: Multiple Global Companies (including Maersk, Merck, Mondelez)
attacks.impact: Over $10 billion in damages globally, disrupted manufacturing and logistics operations worldwide.

attacks.name: Norsk Hydro Ransomware Attack
attacks.impact: Production stopped or switched to manual operations at multiple plants, $75 million in damages.

attacks.name: Kudankulam Nuclear Power Plant Attack
attacks.impact: Data exfiltration from administrative network (contained before reaching critical systems).

attacks.name: EKANS / Snake Ransomware
attacks.impact: Operational disruption, financial losses, and potential safety risks.

attacks.name: Israeli Water Facilities Attack
attacks.impact: Attempted manipulation of water treatment chemicals (largely unsuccessful).

attacks.name: Oldsmar Water Treatment Facility Attack
attacks.impact: Attempted manipulation of sodium hydroxide levels in drinking water (prevented by operator intervention).

attacks.name: Colonial Pipeline Ransomware Attack
attacks.impact: Shutdown of 5,500 miles of pipeline for 6 days, fuel shortages across the US East Coast, $4.4 million ransom paid.

attacks.name: JBS Foods Ransomware Attack
attacks.impact: Shutdown of meat processing plants in US, Canada and Australia; $11 million ransom paid.

attacks.name: Industroyer2
attacks.impact: Attempted blackout in Ukraine during Russian invasion (largely thwarted).

attacks.name: Florida Water Treatment Plant HMI Intrusion
attacks.impact: Unauthorized access to water treatment controls (detected before manipulation).

attacks.name: Incontroller/Pipedream
attacks.target: Liquefied Natural Gas Facilities and Electric Utilities
attacks.impact: No confirmed deployment, but capable of causing physical damage and safety incidents.

attacks.name: Lockbit Ransomware Attack on Port of Nagoya
attacks.impact: Disruption to Japan's busiest port, affecting cargo handling systems.

attacks.name: Raspberry Robin ICS Targeting
attacks.impact: Potential espionage and preparation for destructive attacks.

attacks.name: MOVEit Transfer Attacks on Critical Infrastructure
attacks.impact: Exfiltration of sensitive operational data from multiple critical infrastructure entities.

attacks.name: Unified Threat Actor Campaign
attacks.target: US Water Utilities and Industrial Control Systems
attacks.method: Remote Access Trojans, Custom ICS Malware
attacks.impact: Persistent access to multiple water utility control systems.

attacks.name: Quantum Ransomware Attack on Critical Manufacturing
attacks.impact: Production stoppages across multiple countries, supply chain disruptions.
